name: Law Office of Scott C Smith Reviews

review.title: “It never gets boring.”
review.pros: Pros – Dynamic law practice with new opportunities to expand one's professional capabilities in ways not expected before. Intimate and dignified.
review.cons: Cons – Small office setting lends itself to micromanagement, although the meticulous oversight of each employee provides comfort that a quality work product leaves the office.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
